title: Bill Announcement – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			
Issued on:
December 14, 2018
On Thursday, December 13, 2018, the President signed into law:H.R. 754, the “Anwar Sadat Centennial Celebration Act,” which provides for the posthumous award of a Congressional gold medal to Anwar Sadat in recognition of his heroic achievements and courageous contributions to peace in the Middle East;H.R. 1207, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 306 River Street in Tilden, Texas, as the Tilden Veterans Post Office;S. 2377, which designates the Federal building and United States courthouse located at 200 West 2nd Street in Dayton, Ohio, as the Walter H. Rice Federal Building and United States Courthouse;S. 3414, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 20 Ferry Road in Saunderstown, Rhode Island, as the Captain Matthew J. August Post Office; andS. 3442, which designates the facility of the United States Postal Service located at 105 Duff Street in Macon, Missouri, as the Arla W. Harrell Post Office.
